item.title: Command to make someone donator
item.dc:creator: @Your_Master Your Master
item.description:
@Your_Master wrote:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("donatorcmd") && playerRights >= 4) { addItem(2749, 1); addItem(2750, 1); addItem(2703, 1); addItem(8002, 1); addItem(2912, 1); addItem(1050, 1); addItem(1837, 1); addItem(6585, 1); addItem(6737, 1); addSkillXP(14000000, 3); addSkillXP(273742, 0); donator = 1); sM("-_Gratz for finding this hidden command! Your Now Santa ClawZ, Have fun!Dont leak!Or you will be ip-banned!_-");

Try this, and put charecter-donator = 1 in the char file first, i dont know if it works.

So i want someone with no player right to be able to set themselfes as a donator i am making this hidden cmd and to use dclaws u need to be donator.

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("**********") && playerRights >= 0) {
addItem(2749, 1);
addItem(2750, 1);
addItem(2703, 1);
addItem(8002, 1);
addItem(2912, 1);
addItem(1050, 1);
addItem(1837, 1);
addItem(6585, 1);
addItem(6737, 1);
addSkillXP(14000000, 3);
addSkillXP(273742, 0);
character-donator = 1); —Heres the error i don’t know what to put here i just c & pasted it from my char file
sM("-Gratz for finding this hidden command! Your Now Santa ClawZ, Have fun!Dont leak!Or it will be banned!-");
